meanings.definition: To post a message on the social media platform Twitter.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy tweeting about my day on Twitter.
meanings.sent2: She spends hours tweeting updates to her followers.
meanings.sent3: My cat started tweeting on Twitter, pretending to be me.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like birds tweeting in the morning, filling the air with chatter.
meanings.sent5: The act of tweeting on Twitter is addictive and fun.

meanings.definition: The act of sending a message on Twitter.
meanings.sent1: Tweeting is a common way to share news online.
meanings.sent2: I received a lovely tweet from my friend this morning.
meanings.sent3: The tweeting of funny memes always brightens my day.
meanings.sent4: Her tweet was like a ray of sunshine in my feed, bringing a smile to my face.
meanings.sent5: The art of tweeting can be a powerful tool for communication.

meanings.definition: The sound made by a bird.
meanings.sent1: The tweeting of the birds woke me up early.
meanings.sent2: I love listening to the tweeting of sparrows in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The tweeting of the birds outside my window is like a natural alarm clock.
meanings.sent4: The tweeting of the birds in the forest created a symphony of nature.
meanings.sent5: The tweeting of the birds filled the air with melodies of morning.
